articles.description: After losing to Canelo Alvarez four years ago, Gennadiy Golovkin is closer than ever to getting his desired trilogy fight. Why did it take so long?
articles.content:
Gennadiy Golovkin stormed through the red, white and blue ropes encompassing the ring in disgust and made a beeline for his dressing room.
He wasn't interested in sticking around at T-Mobile Arena i… [+17897 chars]

articles.author: Andrew Lawrence
articles.title: LeBron James owns plenty of blame in his personal annus horribilis - The Guardian
articles.description: The Los Angeles Lakers’ season is effectively over and their shadow general manager has played his part in their downfall
articles.content: Two years ago the world may have been upside down, but all was right in Laker Nation. After a decade of futility the Purple and Gold were on top of the NBA, champions once again. As the confetti fell… [+4945 chars]
